S

sendSpriteToBack(Entity) - Method in class World
Locates the current Entity within the World (if it exists) and sends it to the back of the screen.
setID(String) - Method in class Variable
Sets the id of the current Variable to the new, specified id.
setIndex(int) - Method in class Sprite
Changes the indexed location of the Sprite within it's parent SpriteSheet.
setLocation(int, int) - Method in class Vertex
Sets the location of the Vertex to the specified coordinates.
setName(String) - Method in class Sprite
Changes the name assigned to the current Sprite.
setName(String) - Method in class SpriteSheet
Changes the name of the current SpriteSheet.
setParentName(String) - Method in class Sprite
Changes the parent name assigned to the current Sprite.
setPet(Entity) - Method in class World
Sets the Pet instance.
setPlayer(Entity) - Method in class World
Sets the Player instance.
setType(int) - Method in class Sprite
Changes the sprite type.
setValue(String) - Method in class Variable
Sets the value of the current Variable to the new, specified value.
size() - Method in class Graph
Returns the number of Edges in the Graph.
size() - Method in class SpriteSheets
Returns the number of SpriteSheets in the SpriteSheet collection.
size() - Method in class Variables
Returns the number of Variable objects stored within the collection of Variables.
sprite - Variable in class Entity
The Sprite assigned to the current entity.
Sprite - Class in <Unnamed>
The Sprite class represents a 2D image which can be drawn onto the screen.
Sprite(String, String) - Constructor for class Sprite
Constructs a new Sprite from a specified file and directory.
Sprite(String, String, int) - Constructor for class Sprite
Constructs a Sprite from a specified file and directory and assigns a specified index to it.
Sprite(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class Sprite
Constructs a Sprite from a BufferedImage.
Sprite(BufferedImage, int) - Constructor for class Sprite
Constructs a Sprite from a BufferedImage and assigns a specific index to it.
Sprite(BufferedImage, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Sprite
Constructs a Sprite from a sub-image of an image and assigns a specific index to it.
SpriteSheet - Class in <Unnamed>
The SpriteSheet class represents a collection of Sprites (images) which are part of a larger SpriteSheet (image).
SpriteSheet() - Constructor for class SpriteSheet
Constructs an empty SpriteSheet.
SpriteSheet(Sprite, Vector<Rectangle>) - Constructor for class SpriteSheet
Constructs and initialises a SpriteSheet using a specified SpriteSheet image and a collection of offsets.
SpriteSheet(Sprite, Rectangle[]) - Constructor for class SpriteSheet
Constructs and initialises a SpriteSheet using a specified SpriteSheet image and a collection of offsets.
SpriteSheet(Sprite, int, int, int, int, int, int, boolean, int, int) - Constructor for class SpriteSheet
Constructs and initialises a SpriteSheet using a grid specification.
spriteSheetIndex - Variable in class Entity
The index of the Sprite within the originating SpriteSheet (for quick reference).
SpriteSheets - Class in <Unnamed>
 
SpriteSheets() - Constructor for class SpriteSheets
Constructs an empty SpriteSheet collection.
